mapper.select: select c.uid from (select * from ((select uid,exp from user_vary where exp>#{exp} ORDER BY exp asc limit 0,50) union ((select uid,exp from user_vary where exp<#{exp} ORDER BY exp desc limit 0,50)) ORDER BY exp desc ) as a) as c left join (select * from (select fuid from user_friend where uid=#{uid}) as b ) as d on c.uid=d.fuid where d.fuid is null

select uv.uid,uv.age,uv.cuplevel,uf.rolename,uf.figureurl_qq,ub.totalscore from user_vary as uv LEFT JOIN user_info as uf on uv.uid=uf.id LEFT JOIN user_bestscore as ub on uv.uid=ub.uid where uv.uid=#{uid}
select count(*) as count from user_friend where uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from user_friend where uid=#{uid} and fuid=#{fuid};
mapper.update: update user_friend set result=0 where result!=0;
